lets see I'll tell you a little bit about myself and introduce you to our cast of characters. I'm 34, I grew up in a little town called Springfield, Ohio. My nickname came from some "Aquaintences" I had in High School where most nicknames start, I guess I got it because I was very distant and acted like I was on Acid all the time. Had a friend named Freon that actually did freon, (yes the cold stuff you put in your AC) it lowered his voice whenever he did it I thought of it like reverse helium. anyways, I currently work in a Web Development firm for the timeshare industry. here are the people in my life right now... (Names changed to keep this safe...) Mom (I moved her out here from Cali after my Father passed away becuase money was tight) Peach (my Current GF) just moved to town from Georgia because of a job move, we live together) AAGirl (Peaches Niece) lives with us.. needs to stop smoking and needs to see drinking and driving is bad... Lexx (my Direct Supervisor), a cool guy, has all the looks most women want, and the personality to go with it Est (Co worker), cool guy, knows alot about Oracle DB's and is my go-to guy when things get wierd in code Biddit (Another Coworker) our QA Guy, really gets on my nerves and a few other peoples here too but he has this personality that you can't stay mad at for long Anim (Yet another Co Worker) does Comic books and is my co-on-call person Bjork (Owner of our company) cool guy from out of the country. Acid
